heading: HR01519
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN IMMEDIATE CONGRESSIONAL INVESTIGATION INTO THE PURCHASE OF P3.5-BILLION WORTH OF DENGVAXIA ANTI-DENGUE VACCINES BY THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) UNDER THE FORMER ADMINISTRATION, WHICH HAVE BEEN FOUND TO POSE HEALTH RISKS TO MORE THAN 700,000 SCHOOL CHILDREN INOCULATED, AND TO HOLD ACCOUNTABLE THOSE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SAID PURCHASE
principal-authors: ATIENZA, JOSE JR. L.; SUAREZ, DANILO E.; BRAVO, ANTHONY M., Ph.D.; GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A.; CHAVEZ, CECILIA LEONILA V.; LEE, DELPHINE GAN; SALON, ORESTES T.; DE VERA, EUGENE MICHAEL B.; BERTIZ, ANICETO "JOHN" III D.; ARCILLAS, ARLENE B.;
